Header.title: IN CONNEXT WE TRUST
Header.paragraph: Connext powers fast, secure bridging between blockchains and rollups for composable, trust minimized value.

About.paragraph:
Connext is set to become the solution for fully generalized communication across L2s and other chains.  Users don’t need to realize what chain they are using, enabling a true, multichain World.” 

- Arjun Bhuptani, Founder.

Services.name: Inform
Services.text: Scale the community and increase awareness of Connext’s work.>

Services.name: Distribute
Services.text: Identify talent in the community and elevate this talent into leadership positions.

Services.name: Find a gem person
Services.text: Build a grassroots developer community that can foster adoption of the protocol.

Services.name: Be a teacher
Services.text: Educate new and existing community members about Connext’s vision and technology.

Services.name: Growth strong routers
Services.text: Drive growth of routers, and simplify their onboarding process.

Services.name: Build web3
Services.text: Decentralize critical initiatives within the community, such as the Community Leaders program, Grants, Connext Academy, and router ecosystem management.

Testimonials.text: Connext is set to become the solution for fully generalized communication across L2s and other chains.  Users don’t need to realize what chain they are using, enabling a true, multichain World.
Testimonials.name: Arjun Bhuptani, Founder.

Testimonials.text:
“We started in 2017 as one of the first teams to work on L2 research, as we have always been interested in improving the user experience of Ethereum and the broad ecosystem.

In 2018, we built the first L2 on Ethereum with Spankchain.
Testimonials.name: Arjun Bhuptani, Founder.

Testimonials.text:
We soon realized we were heading towards a fragmented and multi chain space, and achieving cross-chain interoperability was going to revolutionize the blockchain experience.

In 2020 we built a demo to trustlessly move tokens across L2s.
Testimonials.name: Arjun Bhuptani, Founder.

Features.title: Low Cost
Features.text: Transfers are highly capital efficient, making Connext the cheapest bridging infra for users

Features.title: Trustless
Features.text: The safest protocol in the space, with no trusted third parties required

Features.title: Openness
Features.text: Welcome team and community members of all genders, ethnicities, backgrounds, orientations, and from all jurisdictions

Features.title: Universal
Features.text: Connext can be deployed to and works the same way on any kind of chain or L2 system
